Now I understand the problem! Based on your PR changes and the current state of your files, here's what's happening:

## Plan
- Your local files haven't been updated with the PR changes
- The `app/index.tsx` still contains the old dashboard code
- Missing the new `dashboard.tsx` and `time-tracking.tsx` files
- The `_layout.tsx` doesn't have the new route configurations

## The Issue

Your local repository is **6 commits behind** the main branch (as shown in the git status). The changes from [PR #5](https://github.com/ArronJLinton/cpr-valet-demo/pull/5) haven't been pulled to your local environment yet.

## Steps to Fix

1. **Pull the latest changes:**
   ```bash
   git pull origin main
   ```

2. **Verify the changes are applied:**
   - `app/index.tsx` should show a welcome screen with login/signup UI
   - `app/dashboard.tsx` should exist and contain the EmployeeDashboard
   - `app/time-tracking.tsx` should exist with time tracking functionality
   - `app/_layout.tsx` should include routes for dashboard and time-tracking

## Notes
- Your PR was successfully merged, but your local branch needs to be updated
- The `unstable_settings.initialRouteName: 'index'` in `_layout.tsx` should correctly route to the home screen
- Once you pull the changes, the home screen should load as the default page instead of the time tracking page

The reason you're still seeing the time tracking page is because your local `app/index.tsx` still contains the old dashboard code that renders `EmployeeDashboard`, which includes the time tracking functionality.

I see the issue! Git is preventing the pull because there's an untracked file that would be overwritten. Here's how to fix it:

## Plan
- Remove or move the conflicting untracked file
- Complete the git pull to get your PR changes
- Verify the home screen loads correctly

## Steps to Fix

1. **Remove the conflicting file:**
   ```bash
   rm .specstory/history/2025-10-23_00-44Z-create-homescreen-layout-with-buttons.md
   ```

2. **Then pull the changes:**
   ```bash
   git pull origin main
   ```

3. **Alternative - if you want to keep the file:**
   ```bash
   mv .specstory/history/2025-10-23_00-44Z-create-homescreen-layout-with-buttons.md .specstory/history/2025-10-23_00-44Z-create-homescreen-layout-with-buttons.md.backup
   git pull origin main
   ```

## Notes
- The untracked file is blocking the merge because it conflicts with changes in the remote branch
- Once you remove/move it and pull, you'll get all the changes from your PR
- Your home screen should then load as the default page instead of the time tracking page

The git error is preventing you from getting the updated files that contain your new welcome screen implementation.
